Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: caroline camps
Reviews.Content: Am not a expert with cameras but this is simple point and shoot camera to me.  I love the face recognition, how the camera can tell when to use the flash.  This is perfect for me because I can't tell anything about which is the lighting mode to use.There is so muchto learn about it, I just having fun.  The only thing is I brought it from China and the manual I receive was in Chinese however there is a digital one on the cd and printing it out was annoying.I did not receive one of the cable from the company but they a sending it to me but now I have to pay an additional sum of money to clear it and this am piss about.

Reviews.Title: Great service
Reviews.Author: mhall
Reviews.Content: It said it was going to take a month or more to receive it and it got here in about a week but was in Japanese. Sent email to Fuji and they told me how to change the language.
